name: Lid of a lidded and mounted bowl
description: Lid of a lidded and mounted bowl; Mounts attributed to Wolfgang Howzer (Swiss, active 1660 - about 1688); Arita, Japan; porcelain about 1650 - 1680; mounts about 1680; Hard-paste porcelain, underglaze blue decoration with gilt-metal mounts; 14 x 25.5 cm (5 1/2 x 10 1/16 in.); 85.DI.178.2.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Lid of a lidded and mounted bowl
